title: Mews leads top 10 funding rounds in rough quarter for Dutch tech
resume: Deal count in the Netherlands fell for the fifth successive quarter in Q1 2025
author: Siôn Geschwindt
segments: Limited offer: Bag 2 tickets for the price of 1!
Register for TNW Conference by 15 April and get another ticket totally free!

Early-stage startups, on the other hand, were a rare bright spot in an otherwise poor outlook. Seed deals (typically €1mn-€4mn) accounted for nearly half of all investments in Q1 2025, with total funding in this category growing over 15% year-on-year to €58.4mn.
